name: 林鈞陶
objective:
此課程主要是含蓋無線通訊基頻訊號處理的理論基礎與系統架構，探討無線通道所能提供的通道容量以及可靠通訊。而大部分的課程內容會以目前熱門的多輸入多輸出(MIMO)傳輸為背景而進行探討。課程綱要如下:
1.無線通道模型
2.多樣性
3.通道容量
4.MIMO I: 空間多工
5.MIMO II: 通道容量與多工架構
6.MIMO III:多樣性與多工間取捨
7.MIMO IV: 多使用者通訊
This course provides thefundamental theories and architectures for baseband wireless communications. It is concerned that how reliable communication can be achieved and what is the capacity a channel can provide. Much attention will be focused on the newly developed technology, referred to as multiple-inputmultiple-output (MIMO) transmission.
Course outline:
1.The Wireless Channel 
2.Diversity
3.Capacity of Wireless Channels
4.MIMO I: Spatial Multiplexing 
5.MIMO II: Capacity and Multiplexing Architectures
6.MIMO III: Diversity-Multiplexing Tradeoff
7.MIMO IV: Multiuser Communication
